titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the month of September as "Clinical Research Innovation Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary: 9/17/2014--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of September 2014 as Clinical Research Innovation Month. Honors and recognizes the contributions of Clinical Research Organizations.
